alert.note: Alert for Chiriaco Summit; Imperial County Southwest; Imperial County West; Imperial Valley; Salton Sea (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued August 20 at 4:12PM PDT until August 20 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Southwest corner of Imperial County, Salton Sea, Western Imperial County, Imperial Valley and Chiriaco Summit. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Very difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects will become airborne. Moderate tree and minor structural damage possible.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chiriaco Summit; Imperial County Southwest; Imperial County West; Imperial Valley; Salton Sea
